definition: can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy

sentences.english: How can you suffer such insolence?
sentences.chinese: 你怎能忍受这样的侮辱呢？

sentences.english: Amazing love, how can it be, that Thou my God shouldst die for me.
sentences.chinese: 奇异的爱，怎能如何，我主我神竟为我死。

sentences.english: How was I supposed to know that the one twin would break it with his head?
sentences.chinese: 我怎能料到双胞胎中的一个会用头把他弄碎呢？

sentences.english: How can I make you like Admah ?
You don't get much sleep when the cold and wet are invading every inch of your body.
sentences.chinese: 当寒冷和潮湿浸透你身体的每一寸肌肤时又怎能睡好。

sentences.english: We can't neglect the value of morden science.
sentences.chinese: 对现代科技的价值无论怎能重视也不过分。

sentences.english: You simply cannot miss the chance for such a unique Chinese cultural tour!
sentences.chinese: 这么一趟别具趣味的中国文化游，你又怎能错过呢？

sentences.english: With such negative karma, how could he be reborn in heaven?
sentences.chinese: 具有如此的恶业，那怎能再生于天堂？

sentences.english: You are the salt of the earth, but if the salt loses its savor, with what shall it be salted?
sentences.chinese: 你们是世上的盐。盐若失了味，怎能叫他再咸呢？

sentences.english: Salt is good: but if the salt have lost his savour, wherewith shall it be seasoned?
sentences.chinese: 盐本来是好的，但如果失了味，怎能使它再咸呢？

sentences.english: Should all acquaintance be forgot and never brogot to mind?
sentences.chinese: 怎能忘记旧日朋友，心中能不怀想。

sentences.english: You are the salt of the earth. But if the salt loses its saltiness，how can it be made salty again？
sentences.chinese: 你们是世上的盐，盐若失了味，怎能叫他再咸呢？

sentences.english: But locusts can’t swim, so how could it be?
sentences.chinese: 蝗虫不会游泳，因此怎能发生这种情况呢？

sentences.english: Yesterday although dissipated, distinguishes to meet by chance difficultly, how can forget your affection.
sentences.chinese: 昨天虽已消逝，分别难相逢，怎能忘记你的一片深情。

sentences.english: How else can you hope to get it?
sentences.chinese: 舍此之外你怎能希获得它呢？

sentences.english: How could I deny him what may turn out to be a fun opportunity?
sentences.chinese: 我怎能剥夺有可能让他开心的一个大好机会呢？

definition: how could one dare?/I don't deserve such praise
to have the heart to do sth/to steel oneself to a task
did I ever ...? (or "did he ever ...?" etc)
why bother?/is it worth the trouble?
let alone/to say nothing of/besides/what's more
